title: Statistical Consulting Made Easy.
text:
Statistical Consulting Made Easy.
AI-assisted statistical advice guided by human experts
Get Started






The best of both worlds.


Whether it’s a quick question about interpretation, code or methodology, or a full statistical project, StatChat can help you hit the ground running–taking advantage of the breadth of knowledge in modern GPT’s while maintaining accuracy and confidence by having a professional statistician by your side every step of the way.






Expert review through set checkpoints or ad-hoc requests





Make progress in minutes, not weeks or months





Save on cost from traditional statistical consulting





Develop your statistical literacy
